name: Similar Web
description: This API helps you to query website traffic and key metrics for any website, including engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking and traffic source... to create a plugin like similarweb.com

api_methods.name: get-analysis
api_methods.description: Get website traffic, key metrics, including engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking and traffic source.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Any site or domain that you are familiar with. Ex : amazon.com

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the traffic analysis for amazon.com?
I need to know the key metrics for the website ebay.com.
What's the engagement rate and traffic ranking for netflix.com?
Give me the traffic sources and keyword ranking for bbc.com.
Could you analyze the website traffic for nytimes.com?
I want to see the website metrics for techcrunch.com.
Please provide the traffic analysis for the domain cnn.com.
What are the key metrics for the site forbes.com?
Can you show me the traffic ranking and engagement rate for theguardian.com?
I'd like to know the traffic sources for the website bloomberg.com.
